ygData.subject: Re: Treants
ygData.msgSnippet: It is a lot easier for a necro to kill a treant than an sk... I was killing them solo at 21
ygData.messageBody:
It is a lot easier for a necro to kill a treant than an sk... I was killing
them solo at 21


>From: "Dino Buffetta" <DBuffett@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Treants
>Date: Thu, 21 Oct 1999 08:06:38 -0500
>
>I was in SK and con'ed a Treant he con'ed yellow at 22nd now 23rd I have
>not con'ed any yet. But what lvl can a necro solo this GOODIE LOSERS. And
>maybe some tactics to fighting them. And also what lvl are the Millers in
>Q. hills my gnome necro friend told me that he went from 24th to 29th
>fighting them only (only problem he had was to get there spawn separated. I
>am a no wimpy necro I love to fght yellows and reds (SOLO).
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated
